Title: WpfIpodControls
Description: It's an assembly that contains WPF styles and controls with IPod Touch look like
HomeWiki:
Project Description
It's an assembly that contains WPF styles and controls with IPod Touch look like


At this time styles are defined only for following components :
- Button
- ListBox
- CheckBox

Screenshots :



switches are checkboxes with a specific style



as on Ipod each item in Listbox is separated by a line
